content: Now Senator Bob Graham of Florida while Chairman of the Senate Intelligence Committee is backing up House Speaker Pelosi by stating he also was kept in the dark by the CIA just as the House Speaker was. Seems to be a pattern developing here o deceit coming from the CIA and their new found allies, the Republicans. And of course, the Republican's are jumping on it, totally ignoring the business of the people in an effort to save Dick Cheney and George W. Bush from their rightful legacy of being the "torture administration." Fact is, as I stated so many times before, the Republicans have nothing good to add to the lives of the American people, no new ideas, nothing except cover for their failures by diverting American's attention from the real issues that matter, with faux issues like this. No wonder the people don't trust their scams any longer. No wonder they lose elections. It doesn't take a rocket scientist to figure that out. "I believe that banking institutions are more dangerous to our liberties than standing armies." - T. Jefferson

content: quote: In fact there is a briefing record, and Ms. Pelosi is demanding that it be released. Republicans are going to regret trying to destroy her. Why? Because the administration clearly wants this issue to disappear. Now, these attacks have aroused so much public interest, from BOTH rank and file Republicans AND rank and file Democrats, that it's going to be impossible to make it go away. They are forcing the administrations hand. They are going to be getting exactly what they prayed for - and it wont be pretty. Dave I cannot help but hear the darth vader music on in my head while reading this.
